title.rendered: What is the Internet of Bodies (IoB), and why should you care?

<title>What is The Internet of Bodies (IoB), and Why Should You Care? — ITRex</title>
<meta name="description" content="The Internet of Bodies (IoB) is a new wave of fitness, wellness, and medical devices that collect and analyze health-related, biometric, and behavioral data, paving the way for more efficient and affordable healthcare." />
